name: Chicken Devan
recipeIngredient: 3 whole chicken breasts (cooked, boned and cut in pieces)
2 cans condensed cream of chicken soup

recipeInstructions.text: Place broccoli in 9x13 pan season with salt and pepper. Place chicken on top, make a sauce of soup, mayo, lemon juice and curry. Pour over above, sprinkle with cheese.
